description.main: This is my blog about the world of diving and everything related to it. Here you'll find articles about diving theory, descriptions of dive sites I've visited, and a database of underwater creatures I've encountered during my dives.
description.firstPost: In my very first post on this site, I shared how I was first introduced to diving.
description.passion: Diving has captivated me so much that I dedicate most of my time to it. When I'm not diving, I read books and articles on the subject, process videos and photos from dives, write notes about my adventures, or at least try to do so ğŸ˜€.

social.title: Follow me on social media:
social.instagram: Instagram - Short Reels from my dives.
social.telegram: Telegram - Short notes and thoughts about diving.
